thread.title: Serena Williams not engaged to rapper Drake
thread.title_full: Serena Williams not engaged to rapper Drake - Sports

author: PTI
title: Serena Williams not engaged to rapper Drake
text:
Los Angeles: World No 1 tennis star Serena Williams' representative has dismissed reports suggesting the tennis ace is engaged to rapper Drake, insisting they aren't even dating.
Also Read:  Serena launches signature clothing line, rumoured beau Drake appears 


Serena Williams and Drake 
The stars hit headlines in August when they were spotted kissing at a Cincinnati, Ohio restaurant and last month (Sep15), Drake, 28, was spotted cheering on Serena at the US Open in New York, reported People magazine.
Also Read:  Serena Williams' friends caution her about fling with Drake 
He also had a front row seat at the sportswoman's HSN Fashion Show during New York Fashion Week, while she returned the favour days later by joining the "Started From The Bottom" rapper at the opening of his new restaurant in Toronto, Canada.
Also Read:  Serena Williams spotted getting cozy with Drake 
Just friends 
"They are simply longtime friends," a representative for Williams said in a statement.
